Loopy

Group (2014-2023):
42Crew

Introduction

Loopy, born Lee Jin-yong, is a South Korean rapper who debuted under MKIT Rain in 2015. The name ‘Loopy’ comes from the English word ‘looping’. The word looping refers to that of his rap flow will make your head spin (loop) which refers to Loopy’s powerful rapping.
